page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content: {IN THE AREA SURVEYED,}THE LAND COVER WAS PRIMARILY RESIDENTIAL.ABOUT HALF OF THE HOUSES WERE OWNER-OCCUPIED AND MOST OF THE REST WERE OWNED BY THE COUNCIL.THE AGE OF THE HOUSES VARIED ENORMOUSLY,FROM VICTORIAN TO POST-WAR. THE OLDER HOUSES WERE USUALLY LARGER AND PRIVATELY OWNED,WHILE MANY OF THE LATER HOUSES WERE FOUND ON 11 COUNCIL DEVELOPMENTS.THE TYPE OF HOUSING IS ALSO QUITE MIXED.ALTHOUGH THERE ARE NO TOWER BLOCKS IN MANSFIELD,PERHAPS BECAUSE OF FEAR OF SUBSIDENCE,OR THE LACK OF PRESSURE FOR NEW HOUSING,MOST OTHER TYPES OF HOUSING WERE FOUND. MORE SEMI-DETACHED HOUSES WERE FOUND THAN ANY OTHER,CLOSELY FOLLOWED BY TERRACED AND DETACHED HOUSES.
